message: This kingdom was set up by King Damen the First.&break; He was the first King to rule Snaildom in the Beta Era and made the Toblerthrone.&break; Made out of 1000 toblerone bars,&break; all eaten by King Damen himself.
Here at the Forge, you can forge items.&break; You can do that by going up to the oven right above.&break; To forge an item, you need to have enough ores and gold.

You can find ores in the Blackmine.&break; There's iron ore,&break; silver ore and gold ore.&break; You currently have {my.materials.iron} iron ore,&break; {my.materials.silver} silver ore and {my.materials.gold} gold ore.
